thread.section_title: St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Distinguished and Full of class.
thread.title_full: Distinguished and Full of class. - Review of St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RichieEddie
title: Distinguished and Full of class.
text:
I stayed here for 3 nights for a business trip. The meetings also took place within the hotel. From start to finish you realise how iconic and luxurious this hotel is. The team were nothing but polite and courteous and the amenities were also more than enough. I had a top floor room overlooking the museum and this was perfect for me. The bed was comfortable and the room cleaned each day thoroughly.
The gym, whilst small, has more than most hotels with a mixture of resistance machines and cardio equipment.
The breakfast and food provided was lovely.
Thank you for a memorable stay.
